sourcesContent:
export const lightTheme = {
  body: '#f5f5f5',
  text: '#333333',
  primary: '#4a6fa5',
  secondary: '#6b8cae',
  accent: '#ff6b6b',
  cardBg: '#ffffff',
  cardShadow: '0 4px 6px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1)',
  sidebarBg: '#2c3e50',
  sidebarText: '#ecf0f1',
};

export const darkTheme = {
  body: '#1a1a1a',
  text: '#f5f5f5',
  primary: '#6b8cae',
  secondary: '#4a6fa5',
  accent: '#ff8e8e',
  cardBg: '#2d2d2d',
  cardShadow: '0 4px 6px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3)',
  sidebarBg: '#1e272e',
  sidebarText: '#ecf0f1',
};
